features: 【Space Saving Shoe Rack】 HAIXIN shoe rack for entryway is able to store boots, high heels and slippers, strong enough to hold 12-14 pair of shoes. Wide use in your entrance, doorway, closet, shoe cabinet, under bed, wardrobe, living room, bathroom etc.

【Free Combination】The shoe organizer Includes connectors. Enable to combine two shoe shelves together side-by-side. This free standing shoe organizer can maximizes vertically storage space in the same footprint or bridged horizontally to expand the unit. The compact design effectively keeps your stuff in an organized way and provides a cozy and tidy home.

【PREMIUM MATERIAL】The narrow shoe storage cabinet made of premium PP plastic with high load-bearing capacity, stability and durability. The bottom of shoe cubby is cocked to prevent slipping, saving your time to sort out the falling shoes repeatedly. The upper layer can hold handbags, keys to properly use of space.

【Easy to Install】The simple modular structure of shoe rack is easy to install. With the help of the detail instruction and hammer, you can easily assemble the whole unit. Each set comes with buckles that attaches all the parts nicely together for more stability. The lightweight design makes it easy to move around in one hand.

【Easy to Care】The shoe storage is made of healthy and non-toxic environmentally friendly plastic. Due to the use of plastic materials, the shoe rack enjoys good waterproofs and can be washed with water. It performs well in organizing your shoes or other accessories.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HAIXIN Shoe Rack——Shaping a better home life ensure your shoes organzied for entryway, garage, closet, balcony and more

Stackable shoe rack provides Space Saving The compact design can effectively use the space to store more shoes. Easy to Get or Place With the wide mouth design, this organizer shelf brings convenience for daily taking to shoes. Flexible Assembly The free standing shoe storage can be combined horizontally or vertically for multiple spaces. Waterproof & Durable Easy to clean with its smooth PP surface. Direct flush and wipe it without disassembly.

Single-row assembly method Installation Method Aim the all panel bottom clasps with the card slot on the main panel and and tap them in. You can buy one or more sets of products according to your needs, and then combine them freely.

Multi-row assembly method Splicing Buckle Cut the buckle from the main panel, then knock the buckle to combined with two sets of shoe racks. The buckle is resulting in a sturdy structure. Perfect both for houses with space and with space limits.

Brand HAIXIN 8 tiers Shoe Rack Package Main panel x 8, Support bar x 24, Rear panel x 6, Installation hammer x1 8 tiers Shoe Rack Size 19.09 in x 10.24 in x 16.93 in/ 48.48 cm x 26 cm x 43cm Signle Cube Size 9.57 in x 10.24 in x 5.63 in/ 24.3 cm x 26 cm x 14.3 cm 8 tiers Shoe Rack Weight 3.61 lb Material Polypropylene Assembly Required Yes Assembly Form Free Combination Features Stackable, Sturdy & Durable, Easy to Clean, Space Saving Placement Location Entryway, Bedroom, Closet, Garage, Under Table, Bathroom Installation Type Free Standing Age Range Adult & Kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks elegant, and is a solid & well-built shoe storage rack!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Out of the box, and the first impression was really good. Looks good quality and it is very solid. It is definitely a premium category product & I would highly recommend it if this design is your thing.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Shelf is very solid- Looks classy and elegant in the home with the box design- Feels very sturdy. Great build quality overall- Comes with instructions/directions leaflet in the package and assembly is super easy with snap-on parts- It is overall very stable & has no risk of falling at all- Very reasonably priced for this qualityCons:- It definitely has limitations with the shoe size. My jordans fitted barely on the shelf so I wish it was wider- It does wobbles since these are plastic boxes & not metallic solid built

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for organizing
reviews.reviewText: Clean look now that all the shoes are off the floor. I think the price could be cheaper since the material is cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great space saver
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and compact. Used in the corner of a closet. Good for sneakers and other similar sized shoes. Not for large shoes or boots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little small, but good for the purpose
reviews.reviewText: This is a lightweight shoe cubby. It works pretty well. It's a little on the small side, but it fits into a lot of places easily. Is light-weight and easy to move. It stands on its own well and I don't have any fear of it tipping over. (That said, if you really tried, you probably could load it in a way that would tip it over, but you'd really have to be trying.)It took me a little bit to figure out the assembly. The instructions say to start left to right, and they mean it. If you go left to right and nestle the 1st corner into the groove, it goes together easily.I tried to reconfigure, and while you can pull it apart, I did break one of the pegs when I did so. Having 1 broken peg did not affect the sturdiness at all, though, because the cubby is well designed with plenty of support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: I needed something on the smaller side to go into a hall closet and this works perfectly for me. It was a little tricky at first with the assembly parts, but once I figured out how to go about it, it went together smoothly. The cubbies themselves are not overly big, but large enough to comfortably hold a pair of shoes. I did have a pair of ankle boots that I had to turn on their side and only one shoe per cubby would fit, as seen on the lower left in the photo. I’m happy with my purchase and would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars More difficult than necessary to put together
reviews.reviewText: I havent been this frustrated putting something so simple together in a long time. Snapping the pieces into each other was really hard to do and they provide you with a plastic mallet but then the plastic components started snapping. Really no need to make such a simple product this tough to snap together. Also i realized the height of each cubby only fits normal shoes, i had to put all my boots on top. I do like how it looks and how easily it fits in my closet since you can maneuver it to stack how you want. I like this product but apparently you need strength to build it haha!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Also works great for hats!
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this for shoes, but it ended up fitting my hats perfectly. Pretty easy to put together with the provided plastic hammer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Happy with this.. but...
reviews.reviewText: This was a Wonderful purchase but I did have some comments/Concerns and observations that may help others. And I have tried to provide detailed photos showing issues and comparisons.1. I didn't find it easy to put together at first.. It was a bit of a challenge because it was a little difficult to get the side supports into the slots at first and it may help to have a extra pair of hands. I found myself getting one side in but then the other would fall before I could get the other side in and if I did get them to stay in it took some work to get them vertical (I felt I might break off the insert tabs). It felt a little bit like building a house of cards that kept falling apart. However, like others, once I was finally able to get the swing of it it did start to be easier but in my opinion it took a waaaay too long for something that should have been simple, at least for me.2. While it is lightweight (which is great) it doesn't feel real "sturdy". I needed it to be two wide and quite tall, so perhaps there is a way to improve that configuration and it may be more solid if you were configuring it to be wider. I would think if you had it the open it would be easy to knock it over or at least catch a corner and have it spill everything out or just fall over as a whole. (I needed it for inside a closet so this isn't a issue for my purpose but may be for others using it in an entry or hallway with foot traffic)3. I got two -8 tier in Black and configured them 2 across and 6 high4. Some of the photos in the listing, IMO, are misleading or downright Fantasy as there is NO way you could put a higher heel in the spaces and the shoes shown have GOT to be CHILD sized.The tallest you could put in there is a very low heel, tennis shoes or a flat sole high top (chucks). If you are looking for a solution for heels you will need to stick to a low/no heel or maybe put them on the sides ( I didn't attempt to try this so don't even know if that would work). I wear size 9-10 so I would imagine for men's sizes you would have more space limitations.5. It also seems that there are TWO completely different styles. I got the Black which are NOT the same as the ones shown in the Video (with all the color choices) or the blue ones which are TOTALLY different. Those look to better Quality/Materials/Construction and also seem to have the ability to make taller "spaces" . That was NOT possible with the pieces I received. *see photos6. I also feel that there was also VERY little actual "swoop" to prevent the "slip off" as shown in the phots. The ones I received seemed almost FLAT with hardly any "swoop" *again see photos.For all these things above I knocked them down to a 4 and honestly I feel it really should be a 3.5 star because of the kind of not so accurate representation in the examples givenSo BE AWARE of all these things before you Order..Now for the Good stuff...1. This was a Perfect Solution for a difficult space in a pre-existing closet set up until I can do a complete gut /remodel so that what a huge WIN-WIN!2. It was LITEREALLY a Perfect solution!3. For the overall price it was a great deal (I got mine on sale - $23.99) and purchased 2 - 8 tier but I am not sure if I would purchase them again at full price but for my situation and needs these Worked Great!4. Is really just a wish list that I hope the manufacture will take into consideration. It would have been nice to ACTUALLY have the choice to ordering the other "style" in the colors they showed in the videos. My only choice was the blue two-toned model which was NOT going to work or the "lesser" I guess "cheaper" version in Black. It would have been nice to have a choice between both styles in more basic colors. White or perhaps Grey.As I said Overall I am extremely happy and it completely fits the bill for what I needed. I hope that my photos can help others make an informed decision and I just wish the seller would have been more accurate and realistic with their photos.
Es perfecto para lo que yo necesito. Ocupa poco espacio y se mantiene muy bien el orden.

Die Lieferung kam in Einzelteilen, gut verpackt mit einem Plastikhammer. Wir haben 2 mal bestellt. Aufbau war nervig aber machbar. Für uns ist das eine Übergangslösung bis wir den Flur renovieren. Große Schuhe passen nicht zusammen rein. Preis Leistung stimmt hier nicht . Wir haben es behalten da wir das Schuhchaos los werden wollten.
Facile da montare , si può mettere in molti spazi , comodo da pulire.

El producto no esta mal y era lo que iba buscando pero me faltan piezas para acabar el nivel 7, compre para 8 niveles pero entiendo que el octavo es el que se queda arriba libre, pero es que me he quedado con 6 niveles por que se les ha olvidado añadir la pieza trasera y los laterales para hacer el nivel 7. Bueno voy a intentar devolverlo por incompleto.
